title: Suicide attack
summary: A suicide attack is any violent attack, usually involving an explosion, in which attackers accept their own death as a direct result of the attacking method used. Suicide attacks have occurred throughout history, often as part of a military campaign (as with the Japanese kamikaze pilots of 1944â€“1945 during World War II),  and more recently as part of terrorist campaigns (such as the September 11 attacks in 2001).
